===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=とうふ}} compound {{m|zh|豆腐|tr=dəu<sup>H</sup> bju<sup>X</sup>|lit=bean + curdled}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''dòufu''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|とうふ|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|acc2=3|acc2_ref=NHK,DJR|a=Ja-Tofu.oga}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|とうふ}}

# [[tofu]], [[bean curd]]
# {{lb|ja|computing|sort=とうふ}} [[tofu]], an empty [[rectangle]] displayed by some systems in place of a character not supported by available fonts.

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|絹%漉し豆%腐|きぬ%ごしどう%ふ}}: silken tofu, soft tofu
* {{ja-r|木%綿%豆%腐|も%めん%どう%ふ}}: cotton tofu, hard tofu
* {{ja-r|凍み豆%腐|しみどう%ふ}}: dried tofu
* {{ja-r|焼き豆%腐|やきどう%ふ}}: [[sear]]ed [[tofu]]
* {{ja-r|湯%豆%腐|ゆ%どう%ふ}}: a cuisine of simmered tofu
* {{ja-r|豆%腐%餻|とう%ふ%よう}}: a fermented tofu of Okinawa
* {{ja-r|豆%腐%化け|とう%ふ%ばけ}}: a form of corrupted text display, where {{l|en|code point}}s that are not included in the current {{l|en|font}} are instead displayed with empty rectangles that resemble blocks of tofu
{{der-bottom}}

====Related terms====
